it.polito.dp2.BIB

Interface BibReader


  • public interface BibReader
    An interface for reading information about the BIB system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BookReader getBook(java.lang.String isbn)
      Gets a reader for a single book, available in the BIB system, given its ISBN.
      java.util.Set<ItemReader> getItems(java.lang.String keyword, int since, int to)
      Gets readers for all the items available in the BIB system whose title contains the specified keyword and whose publication year is between the specified values (between the given "since" and "to" years inclusive; if "to" is lower than "since", an empty set is returned).
      JournalReader getJournal(java.lang.String issn)
      Gets a reader for a single journal, available in the BIB system, given its ISSN.
      java.util.Set<JournalReader> getJournals(java.lang.String keyword)
      Gets readers for all the journals available in the BIB system whose title or publisher contains the specified keyword

    • Method Detail

      • getItems

        java.util.Set<ItemReader> getItems(java.lang.String keyword,
                                   int since,
                                   int to)
        Gets readers for all the items available in the BIB system whose title contains the specified keyword and whose publication year is between the specified values (between the given "since" and "to" years inclusive; if "to" is lower than "since", an empty set is returned).
        Parameters:
        keyword - the title keyword for selecting items or null to get all items.
        since - the publication year since which (inclusive) items have to be selected, or null to get items published since any year.
        to - the publication date to which (inclusive) items have to be selected, or null to get items published to any year.
        Returns:
        a set of interfaces for reading the selected items.

      • getBook

        BookReader getBook(java.lang.String isbn)
        Gets a reader for a single book, available in the BIB system, given its ISBN.
        Parameters:
        isbn - the ISBN of the book to get.
        Returns:
        an interface for reading the book with the given ISBN or null if a book with the given ISBN is not available in the system.

      • getJournals

        java.util.Set<JournalReader> getJournals(java.lang.String keyword)
        Gets readers for all the journals available in the BIB system whose title or publisher contains the specified keyword
        Parameters:
        keyword - the title/publisher keyword or null to get readers for all journals
        Returns:
        a set of interfaces for reading the selected journals

      • getJournal

        JournalReader getJournal(java.lang.String issn)
        Gets a reader for a single journal, available in the BIB system, given its ISSN.
        Parameters:
        issn - the ISSN of the journal to get.
        Returns:
        an interface for reading the journal with the given ISSN or null if a journal with the given ISSN is not available in the system.
